data: {"page":1,"results":[{"backdrop_path":"/2u7zbn8EudG6kLlBzUYqP8RyFU4.jpg","id":122,"title":"The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King","original_title":"The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King","overview":"As armies mass for a final battle that will decide the fate of the world--and powerful, ancient forces of Light and Dark compete to determine the outcome--one member of the Fellowship of the Ring is revealed as the noble heir to the throne of the Kings of Men. He later enters Sugar Rush, a kart racing game set on tracks made of candies, cookies and other sweets. However, the more Reacher delves into the case, the less clear-cut it appears.
